name: Deep Space Time (LD51)
description:
Find your way through space and time!

Submitted as part of Ludum Dare 51 https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/51/working-title

Controls:

  • WASD for movement or arrows
  • E to interact
  • Q to speed things along
  • Esc to bring up pause menu or to close dialogs

Credits:

  • Character sprite https://gamekrazzy.itch.io/8-direction-top-down-character
  • Ship tilemap https://oshq.itch.io/tilemap-sf
  • Font https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Roboto
  • Music: “Space Ambience” by Alexander Nakarada (www.serpentsoundstudios.com)
    • Licensed under Creative Commons BY Attribution 4.0 License https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
  • Footsteps sfx https://github.com/zulubo/Zulubo-Sounds
